SODIUS.TITLE: FullStack Developer Angular/Java
SODIUS.DESCRIPTION: Since december of 2021, I joint Sodius-Willert to work on collaborative software for the 'DGA' (the army)

LUMIPLAN.TITLE: FullStack Developer Angular/Java
LUMIPLAN.DESCRIPTION: During the year 2021, I participated in the implementation of a SaaS solution to manage the display of information in the field of transport, city and mountain

THALES.TITLE: Développeur C#
THALES.DESCRIPTION: J’ai effectué mon stage de fin d’étude chez Thales Avionics pour réaliser un prototype de génération de terrain pour offrir un nombre illimité de scénarios de vol pour des simulateurs

ABOUT.DESCRIPTION1: Hello There, I’m Rodolphe. For the past 2 years, web developpement has been a big part of my life. After graduating at ENSIM I’m a now au Fullstack Developer at Sodius-Willert and an aspiring freelancer on my FreeTime.
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION2: My goal is to create engaging applications with high standards on user-experience and user interface.

LUMIPLAY.LABEL: Lumiplay
LUMIPLAY.DESCRIPTION1: Lumiplay is a SaaS solution for creating, managing and scheduling content. These contents are then sent to devices to be brodcast (mobile application, information panel, public transport, etc).
LUMIPLAY.DESCRIPTION2: I participated in the development of this application for a year using Angular for the frontend and Java (Springboot) for the backend with a PostrgesSQL database.

PERSONAL_PORTFOLIO.LABEL: Portfolio
PERSONAL_PORTFOLIO.DESCRIPTION1: This portfolio was developed in order to present my skills as a Fullstack developer as part of my freelance activity.
PERSONAL_PORTFOLIO.DESCRIPTION2: The mockup was made on figma and the integration was done in angular. Firebase is used for image storage and deployment

SECOLLAB.LABEL: Secollab
SECOLLAB.DESCRIPTION1: Secollab is a web-based data and model review platform in a versioned environment.
SECOLLAB.DESCRIPTION2: I am currently involved in the development of this platform using Angular for the frontend and Java for the backend with a graph database(Neo4j)

BOULDERER.LABEL: Boulderer
BOULDERER.DESCRIPTION1: Boulderer is an ecommerce platform for climbing equipment. This is a case study for practice.
BOULDERER.DESCRIPTION2: The mockup was made on figma and the integration in Angular/Java. Okta is used for authentication and Stripe for payment.
